title: Ep 15: Mollie Chen
itunes:title: Ep 15: Mollie Chen
itunes:subtitle: Please welcome to the stage, Mollie Chen! Not only is she one of the co-founders of beloved Birchbox (disclosure: I LOVE BIRCHBOX), she’s also a consultant working with early stage consumer companies on brand strategy and experience.
description:
Please welcome to the stage, Mollie Chen! Not only is she one of the co-founders of beloved Birchbox (disclosure: I LOVE BIRCHBOX), she’s also a consultant working with early stage consumer companies on brand strategy and experience. She’s very cool and she writes a great newsletter.


Follow “Gee Thanks, Just Bought It!” On Insta: www.instagram.com/geethanksjustboughtitpod 


Mollie is a great Instagram follow, and I am constantly getting great meal ideas from her stories because she makes the act of making breakfast look so easy. It’s fitting, then, that her product pick is a $5 kitchen tool that she swears by. She even wrote about it in her latest newsletter!


Products Mentioned On This Episode:

  • Tiny tongs! https://amzn.to/2vAWXrX
  • Squeeze bottles! https://amzn.to/2vF3Atl  


Follow Mollie on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/molliechen/?hl=en


This week’s sponsor is... Dipsea! Get sex positive and spicy content right on your phone. There’s something for everyone at Dispea. Get a free 30-day trial when you visit https://www.dipseastories.com/geethanks 


Thanks for listening!

Missed an episode? New to the show? Check out past episodes and all of the recommended products by past guests, listeners and Caroline at www.geethanksjustboughtit.com 

Shop the Amazon store: https://www.amazon.com/shop/geethanksjustboughtit! We’re revamping The Spreadsheet for you right now, and it will be back in service in a few weeks. Thanks for your patience!

Follow along with recs (and share your own via DM) on the “Gee Thanks, Just Bought It!” Instagram: www.instagram.com/geethanksjustboughtitpod

Want to get in touch more formally? Have a rec you want to rec? Shoot me an email! Caroline@geethanksjustboughtit.com
